article.name: about
article.title: Who we are
article.contents:
.txtC.unit.simple.simpleLeft.sizeXLg
        .logo.whitelogo.context.typo.txtC.sizeXXXLg.VpadXXXLg.marginAuto
            a.hexarmorname.link.block.fullW.fullH.bold.sizeLg(href="#/en/products/")
                span
                    | HEXARMOR 
                    sup.sizeXXSm.rel.top4 TM

    .txtC.lastUnit
        .aboutbox.VpadXXXLg.HpadXXXLg.rel.txtL
            .abouttitle.graybordered.sizeXXXLg.padXXXLg Idea, Technology, Creation

            article
                .desc.rel.graybordered
                    p.sizeSm.dark.txtJ
                        | As modernity imposes us new constraints and challenges, 
                        | while also constantly offering patterns and techniques, 
                        | we, maintaining R&D to Machinery production flows seek for innovative and adapted, durable materials.
                    h6.TmarLg.sizeR.txtJ
                        | NanoTech, at the service off Safety, Protection and Longevity.
